newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Nov 27.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Nov 27.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Eight Saudi investors to submit a proposal to officials to build dams to accommodate water.
- Saudi Arabia, Hungary to sign trade, promotion and protection of investments accord next year.
- Islamic Development Bank to finance development projects in Islamic states worth $216 million.
- A 40-member Taiwanese trade team visits Saudi Arabia.
